TopicTitle: Probes Before Crew, To The Mun. A Comedy in Two Acts. [Tabarnouche Interplanetary Hardcore No-Save No-Revert Career]

Articles.Content:
I've been working on this modded hardcore career for a while. I'm at that point where my eyes are turning to the Mun. But... thanks to Probes Before Crew and reduced science rewards, I haven't yet unlocked even the Mk1 Command Pod.

So, it's time to test out that orbital relay network I just built and see if I can send an autonomous drone all the way to the surface of the Mun....
